conversations.content: You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Who is the new president of UTN and when did they take office?
Prof. Dr. Michael Huth became the Founding President of UTN on October 1, 2024, succeeding Prof. Dr. Alexander Martin.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
What’s Prof. Huth’s background before joining UTN?
He was a Professor of Computer Science and Head of the Department of Computing at Imperial College London, and his research focuses on AI and cybersecurity.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Hey, I’m an international student—who should I contact about academic affairs?
Prof. Dr. Isa Jahnke is the Founding Vice President for Academic and International Affairs. Email her team at vp-learning@utn.de.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
What’s Prof. Jahnke’s expertise?
She specializes in digital learning and integrating modern technologies into education, combining IT with educational science.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Who oversees research and entrepreneurship at UTN?
Prof. Dr. Alexander Martin is the Founding Vice President for Research, Innovation and Entrepreneurship. His email is vp-research@utn.de.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
What’s Prof. Martin’s research focus?
He works on data analytics, AI, and optimization, and directs the Fraunhofer Institute for Integrated Circuits IIS.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Is there a chancellor at UTN?
Yes, Dr. Markus Zanner has been chancellor since UTN’s founding in 2021 but will leave on April 30, 2025.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Where did Prof. Huth study?
He studied mathematics at TU Darmstadt and earned his PhD at Tulane University in New Orleans.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Does UTN have strong international connections?
Yes! Prof. Jahnke (International Affairs) has worked in Sweden and the U.S., and Prof. Huth has ties to Imperial College London.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
How can I reach the university’s leadership?
Emails: president@utn.de (President), vp-learning@utn.de (Academic Affairs), vp-research@utn.de (Research).

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
What’s Prof. Huth’s connection to industry?
He’s a co-founder of Xayn, an AI startup in Berlin, alongside his academic roles.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
When will UTN appoint a new chancellor?
The search for Dr. Zanner’s successor is ongoing—details are on academics.de (link in the text).

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Did Prof. Martin work with government projects?
Yes, he’s involved in collaborative projects with German federal ministries and the DFG.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
What’s unique about Prof. Jahnke’s role?
She leads digital teaching initiatives, drawing from 15+ years of research in tech-enhanced learning.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Where’s Prof. Huth originally from?

He was born in Aschaffenburg, Bavaria, and returns after 30+ years abroad in the UK/US.

Is there support for entrepreneurship at UTN?
Yes, Prof. Martin’s division handles Innovation & Entrepreneurship—email vp-research@utn.de.

Yes, he co-edits journals and directs the Fraunhofer IIS, linking academia and industry.
